 21  import numpy as np 
 22  from imusim.platforms.sensors import * 
 23  from imusim.environment.gravity import STANDARD_GRAVITY 
 24  from imusim.utilities.documentation import prepend_method_doc 

 25   
 26 -class Accelerometer(Sensor): 

 27      """ 
 28      Base class for accelerometers. 
 29      """ 
 30   

 31 -    def trueValues(self, t): 

 32          gravity = self.platform.simulation.environment.gravitationalField 
 33          g = gravity(self.trajectory.position(t), t) 
 34          l = self.trajectory.acceleration(t) 
 35          a = l - g 
 36          return self.trajectory.rotation(t).rotateFrame(a)

 38 -class IdealAccelerometer(Accelerometer, IdealSensor): 

 39      """ 
 40      An ideal accelerometer. 
 41      """ 

 42   

 43 -class IdealGravitySensor(IdealAccelerometer): 

 44      """ 
 45      An ideal fictional sensor that measures only acceleration due to gravity. 
 46      """ 

 47 -    def trueValues(self, t): 

 48          gravity = self.platform.simulation.environment.gravitationalField 
 49          g = gravity(self.trajectory.position(t), t) 
 50          return self.trajectory.rotation(t).rotateFrame(-g)

 64 -class MMA7260Q(NoisyTransformedSensor, Accelerometer): 

 65      """ 
 66      Model of the Freescale MMA7260Q accelerometer. 
 67   
 68      @ivar sensitivity: Sensitivity setting, '1.5g', '2g', '4g', or '6g'. 
 69      """ 
 70   
 71      NOMINAL_SENSITIVITIES = {'1.5g':800E-3, '2g':600E-3, 
 72              '4g':300E-3, '6g':200E-3} 
 73      NOMINAL_OFFSET = 1.65 
 74      MAX_CROSS_AXIS = 0.05 
 75   
 76      @prepend_method_doc(Accelerometer) 

 77 -    def __init__(self, platform, sensitivity, noiseStdDev, rng=None, **kwargs): 

 78          """ 
 79          @param sensitivity: Sensitivity setting, '1.5g', '2g', '4g', or '6g'. 
 80          @param noiseStdDev: Standard deviation of measured output voltage noise 
 81              in the system in which the accelerometer is integrated. 
 82          @param rng: L{np.random.RandomState} from which to draw imperfections. 
 83          """ 
 84          if rng is None: 
 85              rng = np.random.RandomState() 
 86   
 87          sensitivity = MMA7260Q.NOMINAL_SENSITIVITIES[sensitivity] / STANDARD_GRAVITY 
 88          sensitivity *= rng.normal(size=3, loc=1, scale=0.075/3) 
 89   
 90          sensitivity = np.diag(sensitivity) 
 91          cross_axis = np.eye(3) 
 92          for s in ((i,j) for i,j in np.ndindex(3, 3) if i<>j): 
 93              cross_axis[s] = rng.normal(loc=0, scale=self.MAX_CROSS_AXIS/3) 
 94          transform = np.dot(sensitivity,cross_axis) 
 95   
 96          offset = rng.normal(size=(3, 1), loc=self.NOMINAL_OFFSET, scale = 0.165/3) 
 97   
 98          NoisyTransformedSensor.__init__(self, platform, noiseStdDev, 
 99                  transform, offset, **kwargs)
